title: Transporter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Transport (Night, Infinite): Transport two players at night. All players who would have visited one of your targets will instead visit the other. The targets are not notified, nor are the visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may transport yourself.
- **Ethereal Defense** - Good roles who attack you ignore this defense, REF and Neutral roles will be affected by this defense. Can stack with lower defense types. Defenses lower than None do not count evil visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Good faction lose the game.

desc:
Post 5388
*Apparently this will never become a reality in BtoS 2, so you guys get to see it here!*
